pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, January 22, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, January 22, 2018:

All times local.

Ottawa, Ontario

8:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Davos, Switzerland.

Canada Reception Centre (Hangar 11)
Macdonald-Cartier International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity of departure

Zürich, Switzerland

10 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Zürich, Switzerland.

Zürich Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity upon arrival
